channel.title: Rap Battle the Person Above You
channel.description:
Rap battle the person above you and see who the better rapper is. 4 Simple rules:
1. You must have at least 4 lines of rap, try to rhyme them. 2. Swearing must be censored. 3. Do not kill the rap chain by doing a horrible rap or posting superficial comments. 4. In the spirit of the thread, make up your own rap, don't steal lyrics from real rap songs!
Please keep in mind at all times while reading this that we're still all best buddies. We don't mean to be rude, this is just a thread for all of us to have fun and compete. Now, DJ... spin it!
The best raps will be posted here. PM me your raps and I'll gladly read them. If they're funny, I'll put them here.
[quote="nathanz"]My names nathan i live in a tree, i sell condoms for 35p.. big or small take your pick it all depends on the size of your d*ck.[/quote][quote="Loveandpower"]god bless rhymezone for being on my phone makes it easier to be cheesier[/quote][quote="RandQm"]Your beer is crap, your mom is a trap. Your flows suck, get hit by a truck.[/quote][quote="jme"]This noob ragequits and posts it in his sig cuz his post count will never be this big I ban noobs like love and power, every minute every hour
haters mad cuz i'm a global mod I guess you can call it global fraud Cuz I ban a hoe and drop it ??? profit[/quote][quote="Acorn_"]Chanceperfectrsps, talkin about his gfx need wee wee x im not even sure what the f**k to say next, that shit was so out of context I'm about to make this rap a bit more complex because the chances of you ever getting sex are little to none next to rey x better stick to wipin up with a kleenex word?[/quote]
[u][b][size=12pt]WARNING - POSTS BELOW MAY CONTAIN SWEARING.[/size][/b][/u]
